CustomField.description: This field is required. The admin manually populates this field. This field controls what and how data is displayed in the route. If a screen is being used, a layout type must be set. Otherwise, specific values can be set for Visualforce pages in the system.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Search for: UserInterfaceUIBodyTypeOverviewwithImages nforce__korelatedlist, nforce__kodatagrid, nforce__kogridlist, nforce__korelatedtable, nforce__korelatedlistchild, nforce__kodatagridlookup
CustomField.label: Body
